channel.title: Making money on the internet
channel.description:
Well, it's vacation again so I can use a little extra money. But I want to earn it on the internet, but I don't know how :o So I ask you guys to give me some ideas. It can be anything, legel or illegal, but it has to be better then those sites where you need to do surveys. Those sites give $0,01 per survey or something, and that sucks.
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Making money on the internet
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

There’s no real way unless you take a huge risk in say, hosting a website and hope the ads can pay for the website + bring in profit, or perhaps selling stuff, such as hosting.

Read full topic
